answers.answer: These services include emergency consultations at home and unassisted medical transport activities, offered in addition to minimum package services.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/emergency-consultations and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Patients or their relatives can access these services by calling the 112 emergency service, which then analyzes the situation and dispatches an appropriate ambulance.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/emergency-consultations and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Patients with severe cognitive disorders, immobile patients with tetraparesis or lower limb motor insufficiency, patients with hemiparesis or paraparesis, and bedridden patients qualify for various medical transport services.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/emergency-consultations and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Immobile patients can receive transport to the hospital for hospitalization, round-trip transport to specialist offices for consultations, and round-trip transport to laboratories for paraclinical investigations.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/emergency-consultations and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Transport upon leaving the hospital can be arranged by calling the 112 emergency service, with the call made by the patient, relatives, or hospital staff.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/emergency-consultations and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Patients who are immobilized in bed, have severe cognitive disorders, hemiparesis, or paraparesis can receive round-trip transport to specialist offices for evaluating, monitoring, and prescribing treatment for chronic conditions.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/emergency-consultations and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Private ambulances providing emergency consultations and unassisted medical transport are in contractual relations with health insurance companies. Additionally, some medical investigations are recommended by doctors who are under contract with these companies.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/emergency-consultations and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Bedridden patients receive round-trip transport to and from the laboratory for performing paraclinical medical investigations recommended by family or specialist doctors.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/emergency-consultations and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The information about medical transport services is contained in a guide that outlines the rights of people from the armed conflict zone in Ukraine within the social health insurance system.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/emergency-consultations and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Upon receiving a call, the 112 emergency service dispatcher analyzes the described situation and decides which type of ambulance to send.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/emergency-consultations and read the page carefully.
